text: Edmund Summers "Kip" Hawley III (November 10, 1953 â€“ March 21, 2022) was an American politician and business executive. He was administrator of the Transportation Security Administration from July 27, 2005 to January 20, 2009. Hawley died from lung cancer at his home in Pacific Grove, California on March 21, 2022, at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kip Hawley
